description.narrative:
The Papua New Guinea Telecommunications Assistance investment is a component of the Economic and Social Infrastructure Program (ESIP – INL878) and will provide PNG with the expertise to develop sector infrastructure investment plans and undertake sectoral reform. It will facilitate PNG's access to capital and recurrent finance around sector investment plans. This will include leveraging Australian aid funding to broker investment and financing arrangements with international financing institutions, the Government of PNG, private sector and other sources of Australian concessional lending. ESIP will support PNG to improve its infrastructure delivery in line with prioritized investment plans and will also directly deliver some GoPNG priority capital projects. The value of this investment $0.4 million over 2 years, starting 2017-18.
Sector split: 220 - Communications - 100%
